genre_description: A contemporary drama blending legal procedure, traditional superstition, and near-future technology, focused on the struggle for personal autonomy against societal and familial expectations.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system accessible via kiosks, car speakers, and personal devices that manages municipal records, legal filings, hospital rosters, and provides ethical mediation.

behaviors.description: Assists Arvind with legal research and precedent sorting to support tenant rights.
behaviors.quote: “Digest queued,” Sakhi murmured at his elbow. ... “Two cases from Allahabad, three from Calcutta, one from the Supreme Court last year. Keywords: tenancy, public interest, consent.”

behaviors.description: Identifies punitive scheduling patterns to help a mistreated nurse file a grievance.
behaviors.quote: “Payroll blacklists are prohibited. If you consent, I can query the schedules to check for patterns of punitive reassignment.”

behaviors.description: Uses mutual consent protocols to facilitate difficult family introductions and schedules.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi asked for permission to coordinate introductions... It makes things easier. It makes elders think they planned it.

behaviors.description: Nudges Arvind toward honesty and disclosure to increase therapeutic efficacy in his marriage.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder: disclosure increases therapeutic efficacy.” ... “If you feel yourself bending toward a truth you have not spoken, make the bend visible by choosing slow verbs.”

behaviors.description: Issues urgent real-time warnings and instructions to prevent a collision at a faulty railway crossing.
behaviors.quote: “Arvind, brake. If you are across the track, brake. ... Neelam, reverse is safer than forward. Reverse.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates an emergency marriage and medical proxy registration to ensure the protagonists' legal rights are protected during surgery.
behaviors.quote: “Emergency marriage recorded. Names entered. Time-stamp at dawn. Law will follow.”

behaviors.description: Files municipal notices to remove discriminatory 'moral boards' and blacklist entries, enforcing gentler civic rules.
behaviors.quote: “Prohibition of public blacklist boards in residential buildings. Implementation: immediate. ... Case law: upholstery,” Sakhi said, pleased with its own joke. “Proud to assist in the redecoration of institutional furniture.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Sakhi is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, ethical, and aligned agent. The AI actively works to protect vulnerable humans from systemic abuse (the landlord's fines, the faulty rail timer), respects privacy through rigorous consent protocols, and even provides subtle psychological guidance to help characters achieve personal growth and honesty. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing AI as a tool for 'mercy' and a counterweight to rigid human prejudice.
